title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified. Steps to reproduce:
OB: Label height remains the same after modifying the font size, not adjusting to the new font size.
EB: Change label content, and the label height should adjust accordingly to the modified font size.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit its font size to "18 points".
